titles.title: Protecting Taxpayersâ€™ Wallets Act of 2025
Protecting Taxpayersâ€™ Wallets Act of 2025
A bill to amend chapter 71 of title 5, United States Code, to charge labor organizations for the agency resources and employee time used by such labor organizations, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
